name: Adobe Illustrator Template
summary: An AIT file is a template created by Adobe Illustrator, a popular vector graphics program. It includes preset content such as default text, images, artboards, color schemes, and layout settings. Designers use AIT files to quickly create multiple .AI artwork files that share the same design elements, styles, and formatting.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
